mapper.select: SELECT ts.train_section_Id, TC.train_course_Id, tc.train_course_Name, tc.train_section_number, tpa.pic_url, ts.train_section_sort, ts.train_section_Name, ts.train_litter_section_name, ts.train_litter_section_sort, ts.train_litter_section_url, ts.train_litter_section_type FROM tf_el_train_course tc LEFT JOIN tf_el_train_pic_attr tpa ON tpa.association_Id = tc.train_course_Id LEFT JOIN tf_el_train_section ts ON tc.train_course_Id = ts.train_course_Id WHERE tc.train_course_Id = #{courseId} and ts.train_litter_section_url is null
